data.quote: There is always something left to love.
data.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

data.quote: I think it is important to realize you can miss something, but not want it back.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: I love you not for whom you are, but who I am when I am by your side.
data.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

data.quote: It is enough for me to be sure that you and I exist at this moment.
data.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

data.quote: Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you.
data.author: Dale Carnegie

data.quote: I know of no better life purpose than to perish in attempting the great and the impossible.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: Because she competes with no one, no one can compete with her.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: You've always had the power my dear, you just had to learn it for yourself.
data.author: the wizard of Oz

data.quote: She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that's important.
data.author: Marilyn Monroe

data.quote: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
data.author: Winnie the Pooh

data.quote: Some people care too much. I think it's called love.
data.author: Winnie the Pooh

data.quote: You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you.
data.author: Winnie the Pooh
